content: Pole tool SF PT 8 - 24 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for drill drivers and screwdrivers- ### FEATURES:Features The pole tool can be turned by hand or using a 1/2 variable speed drill The pole can increase safety by helping to avoid ladders/scaffolds Applications Driving eye lag screws with a hole for suspended ceiling applications to wood Driving eye lag screws with a hole for suspended ceiling applications to metal ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 288 in Technical Data | Length | 288 in ### ITEMS- 289876 - Pole tool SF PT 8 - 24 - Package Size 1 pc
